General.Name: Flytech Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Flytech Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, trades in, and sells computers and peripheral equipments in Taiwan, Europe, Africa, the United States, Asia, and internationally. It offers all-in-one point-of-sales (POS), panel PC, mobile POS, KIOSK, tablets, and box PC. The company also provides software and data processing services; and integration of software and hardware services. It serves hospitality, retail, medical, industrial automations, and commercial industries. Flytech Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2.Name: Ms. Mei Huei  Lee
2.Title: Chief Fin. Officer & VP of Management Center
